channel.title: Help me, (MAX STATS AND MAX CMB<- i dont know how to change)
channel.description:
well i have a server, and max stat is 100,
and i was just wondering how do i get the max stat to be 99....also the max combat is 127.
i want it to be 126... so if yous can help me that'd be awesome thanks...

item.dc:creator: @tom_ownz tom_ownz
item.description:
@tom_ownz wrote:

Sweet,

by the way bro,

for some reason when i get 99 stat’s on here it still give’s the skillcape’s on my server

but then it level’s up to 100…

how do i chaneg that…

i did what you told me…
